repo_notes.content: DEVIN//HHS is a Medicaid transparency platform. No credentials or environment variables should be documented - all configuration is via Vercel dashboard.

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the DEVIN//HHS Medicaid Transparency Platform

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide users through installing dependencies and running the development server

page_notes.content: Run npm install then npm run dev. All environment configuration is managed via Vercel dashboard.
Clone repo, run npm install, run npm run dev. All environment variables are configured via Vercel dashboard - no local .env file should be committed.
Deployed via Vercel. Environment configuration managed in Vercel dashboard.

pages.title: Database Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the TimescaleDB setup and schema design

page_notes.content: Database connection is configured via Vercel environment variables. No credentials in codebase.
Uses connection pooling via DATABASE_URL environment variable configured in Vercel.
